author: uli
msg: make sure index re-renders when adding or modifying a blog post

author: stefan2
msg: Speed up serialization of DAG and noderev structures for our caches.
Turns out that 503 bytes is often not sufficient for noderevs with
longer path names and even less so for DAG nodes.  Up that to 1007

author: stefan2
msg: On the fsfs-format7 branch: set the page size to 4kB since this is
still a relatively small number (transfer from OS cache is fast)
and this is also the smallest granularity provided by the underlying
file system.  Larger page sizes mean smaller I/O and OS overhead.
(STMT_CREATE_SCHEMA): set page size to 4kB up from the 1kB default
